movierec package¶

Submodules¶

movierec.main module¶

Main function for executing ‘movie_recommender.py’ author: Javier Nistal

movierec.main.main(args)[source]¶

movierec.movie_recommender module¶

This class implements a simple movie recommendation system based on Singular Value Decomposition (SVD). A matrix ‘M’ with values 1 (seen) and 0 (not seen), as a way of rating, is created out of the input data. This matrix is factorize and reconstructed using SVD. This method allows to reduce the influence of noise and enhacie popular trends in the data.

author: Javier Nistal
